Annotations on five poetical books of the Old Testament (viz.) Job, Psalmes, Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, and Canticles / by Edward Leigh ... Leigh, Edward, 1602-1671.

Printed by A.M. for T. Pierpoint ... E. Brewster ... and M. Keinton ..., London : 1657.
Title page vignette. Advertisement on p. [2] at end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
